home_description: A modern Money Manager app to track income, expenses, and achieve your financial goals.

chart.title: Interactive Transaction Chart
chart.description: Track your financial flow every month with intuitive bar and donut charts. See income vs. expense comparison and category distribution—all in one clear and modern view.

add_transaction.title: Easily Record Transactions
add_transaction.description: Add income and expenses in just a few taps. All data is saved automatically and ready to analyze.

text_left_image_right.body_copy:
## Fully Online
Access and manage your finances from any device—laptop, tablet, or phone—with data always synced in real-time.
No need to worry about losing data.
